forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of patchy fog early. Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
